page.title: 05Employment
page.content: Hartington has many places which offers work for local people. We did a survey to find out how many local people worked in Hartington. The six shops mainly employed people who lived in or near the village.The hotels and two public houses employed local part time staff. The cheese factory is the biggest single employer. It employs 145 people some of whom live in Hartington.There are two cafes and many small guest houses where employment is seasonal. Besides these, employment is provided by the garage, the surgery, the telephone exchange and the farms. One new project is the pottery which sells terra cotta pots which visitors can see being made. It employs three people. In our survey we found that tourism provided a great deal of employment.
